items.title: IDP-Software
items.content_html: Definitions Compiled from Multiple Sources

items.title: 4Semantics
items.content_html: 4Semantics is a Polish intelligent document processing provider that develops the SensID Cognitive Automation platform for automated document data extraction and workflow automation.

items.title: Adobe
items.content_html: Adobe is a company that specializes in intelligent document processing and creative software solutions. The company focuses on creating intelligent automation for document workflows.

items.title: AOTM
items.content_html: AOTM is an intelligent document processing platform developed by Ninestars that uses AI and machine learning for data extraction from business documents.

items.title: Ascron
items.content_html: Ascron is a Polish intelligent document processing provider specializing in legal services and debt collection management automation.

items.title: Automation Anywhere
items.content_html: Automation Anywhere is an AI-powered process automation platform provider offering RPA and intelligent document processing for enterprise automation at scale.

items.title: Botminds AI
items.content_html: Botminds AI is a no-code agentic AI platform provider offering intelligent document processing with proprietary AI algorithms and integrated document automation.

items.title: Captova Technologies
items.content_html: Captova Technologies provides high-speed intelligent document processing for secure and business environments with processing speeds exceeding 100 pages per second.

items.title: Cinnamon AI
items.content_html: Cinnamon AI is an enterprise AI company offering Flax Scanner, an AI-OCR platform for automated data extraction from unstructured documents without template definition.

items.title: ClearDox
items.content_html: ClearDox is an AI-powered commodities intelligence platform providing intelligent document processing and automation solutions for commodity trading operations.

items.title: Cogent Labs
items.content_html: Cogent Labs is an AI company offering SmartRead, an AI-OCR platform for document recognition, classification, and handwriting digitization with 99.2% accuracy.

items.title: Cognaize
items.content_html: Cognaize is an intelligent document processing company offering hybrid intelligence solutions combining AI with expert-in-the-loop workflows for financial services document automation.

items.title: Cogniquest
items.content_html: Cogniquest is a context-aware document intelligence platform combining traditional AI and generative AI for intelligent document processing with human-like document understanding.

items.title: Concord Technologies
items.content_html: Concord Technologies is a healthcare document processing company offering Concord Connect, a straight-through processing platform combining cloud fax, intelligent document processing, and workflow automation.

items.title: Convr
items.content_html: Convr is an AI underwriting workbench for commercial property and casualty insurance, offering Intake AI for automated submission processing and document digitization with 97% accuracy.

items.title: Coveo
items.content_html: Coveo is an AI-powered enterprise search platform provider offering unified content indexing, intelligent search, and generative experiences across commerce, service, websites, and workplaces.

items.title: CrowdAI
items.content_html: CrowdAI provides AI-powered document processing and crowd-sourced intelligence solutions. The company specializes in combining artificial intelligence with human expertise for document processing and analysis.

items.title: Cytora
items.content_html: Cytora is a digital risk processing platform for commercial insurance offering AI-powered submission digitization, risk evaluation, and underwriting automation through its risk flow engine.

items.title: Dataiku
items.content_html: Dataiku is a universal AI platform offering document intelligence capabilities through its data science and machine learning platform with intelligent document processing plugins for text extraction and analysis.

items.title: Datamatics
items.content_html: Datamatics is a digital technology company providing intelligent document processing solutions through its TruCap+ platform.
